title: Autohotkey allowed if i only use it for STRG 6 (Mastery Emote) ?

embed.description: Free keyboard macro program. Supports hotkeys for keyboard, mouse, and joystick. Can expand abbreviations as you type them (AutoText).

body: Is it allowed to use Autohotkey if I only use so it does the Mastery Emote if i press R?

replies.body: chat macros are fine, but actual game interactions be it even emotes rito doesnt like, but you dont need autohotkey for that, you can go into the gameplay settings and change your control 6 to simply be 1 button if you so desire, no need for outside software, the game already does that
